Package icyllis.modernui.text.style

Interface ParagraphStyle

All Known Subinterfaces:
AlignmentSpan, LeadingMarginSpan, LeadingMarginSpan.LeadingMarginSpan2, LineBackgroundSpan, LineHeightSpan, TabStopSpan, TrailingMarginSpan, WrapTogetherSpan
All Known Implementing Classes:
AlignmentSpan.Standard, BulletSpan, CodeBlockSpan, HeadingSpan, LeadingMarginSpan.Standard, LineBackgroundSpan.Standard, OrderedListItemSpan, QuoteSpan, TabStopSpan.Standard, ThematicBreakSpan, TrailingMarginSpan.Standard
public interface ParagraphStyle
The classes that affect paragraph-level text formatting implement this interface.
